00038 // Maximum number of SDIO blocks that can be supported.
00039 #define MAX_SDIOS_NUM_BLOCKS                    4
00040 
00041 #define SDIO_TESTING
00042 
00043 #define SDIOS_DMA_MAX_CHANNELS  4 // 0 to 3
00044 
00045 // Events used in the Register Callback function
00046 #define SDIOS_F0_UPDATE_EVENT                   (1 << 0)
00047 #define SDIOS_F1_UPDATE_EVENT                   (1 << 1)
00048 #define SDIOS_FIFO_OVERFLOW_EVENT               (1 << 2)
00049 #define SDIOS_FIFO_UNDERFLOW_EVENT              (1 << 3)
00050 #define SDIOS_CRC_CHECK_FAILED_EVENT            (1 << 4)
00051 #define SDIOS_TRANSFER_ABORT_EVENT              (1 << 5)
00052 #define SDIOS_TRANSFER_ELEMENT_COMPLETE_EVENT   (1 << 6)
00053 #define SDIOS_BLOCK_COMPLETE_EVENT              (1 << 7)
00054 // - NOTE: This is a bitfield, so additional definitions must always only set a unique bit.
00055
